sentences.en: a baby with round chubby cheeks

sentences.cn: 一个胖乎乎的六岁孩子

sentences.en: Are you a chubby chaser or something?
sentences.cn: 你是对胖子有兴趣还是其他什么?

sentences.en: At first I thought he was rather ordinary looking, a little chubby, not my type.
sentences.cn: 刚开始我认为他相貌很普通，有点胖乎乎的，并非我喜欢的类型。

sentences.en: Do you think I'm too chubby?
sentences.cn: 你觉得我是不是太胖了？

sentences.en: He had twined his chubby arms around Vincent's neck.
sentences.cn: 他胖乎乎的双臂搂住文森特的脖子。

sentences.en: He is stocky though not chubby.
sentences.cn: 他长得敦实,可并不发胖.

sentences.en: He used to kid me about being chubby.
I was born cherubic and chubby.
sentences.cn: 我出生时胖乎乎的，像天使般可爱。

sentences.en: Isn't she a bit chubby? What a big belly!
sentences.cn: 她是不是有点太胖 啊 ?肚子那么大!

sentences.en: It's amazing for such tiny arms to move her whole chubby body!
sentences.cn: 明明是很幼小的手臂,却努力地拉动胖胖的身体,实在很厉害哩!

sentences.en: Schoolmates think that I have chubby figure is very lovable.
sentences.cn: 同学都认为我有个丰满〈圆胖〉的身材是很可爱的.

sentences.en: The baby has a chubby face.
sentences.cn: 那婴儿的脸蛋儿圆圆胖胖.

sentences.en: The baby shows two dimples on his chubby cheeks when he smiles.
sentences.cn: 小娃娃胖嘟嘟的脸儿上,笑起来还有俩酒窝呢.

sentences.en: The chubby little frog refused to try the new beef diet.
sentences.cn: 胖乎乎的小青蛙拒绝尝试新的牛肉饮食.

sentences.en: The short and chubby gentleman over there is our new director.
sentences.cn: 那个既矮又胖的绅士是我们的新主任.

sentences.en: When I was eight, Dad brought home a horse named Chubby.
sentences.cn: 我8岁那年, 爸爸带回家一匹叫查比的马.

trans.tran_cn: 胖乎乎的，圆胖的，丰满的
trans.tran_en: slightly fat in a way that looks healthy and attractive
